==Character Model Size==
{{Main|Measurement#Character Heights}}
For a table of released character heights and model sizes, see the above article on [[Measurement]]. All characters use one of a limited number of character models in-game (tall, medium, and short for male and female). Their heights are measured in [[meter]]s.
